The authors declare no other potential conflicts of interest. 01 10 2025 13 10 498135 1655 1673 25 09 2025 02 10 2025 03 10 2025 03 10 2025 T-cell therapies have transformed cancer treatment. While surface glycans have been shown to play critical roles in regulating T-cell development and function, whether and how the glycome influences T cell–mediated tumor immunity remains an area of active investigation.
